```py
>>> np.count_nonzero(np.eye(4))
4
>>> a = np.array([[0, 1, 7, 0],
...               [3, 0, 2, 19]])
>>> np.count_nonzero(a)
5
>>> np.count_nonzero(a, axis=0)
array([1, 1, 2, 1])
>>> np.count_nonzero(a, axis=1)
array([2, 3])
>>> np.count_nonzero(a, axis=1, keepdims=True)
array([[2],
 [3]]) 
```
